meanings.sent1: The swampiest area in the forest was difficult to walk through.
meanings.sent2: After the rain, the ground became swampiest near the river.
meanings.sent3: The swampiest part of the park was where all the frogs liked to hang out.
meanings.sent4: Her room was the swampiest after her little brother spilled water everywhere.
meanings.sent5: The swampiest corner of the garden was where the mosquitos gathered in the evening.

meanings.sent1: The swampiest day of the year was when it rained non-stop for hours.
meanings.sent2: Living near the swampiest part of town meant dealing with constant humidity.
meanings.sent3: The swampiest spot in the yard was where the dog loved to roll around.
meanings.sent4: Her shoes were the swampiest after walking through the muddy field.
meanings.sent5: The swampiest smell came from the old pond behind the house.
